reviewText: The crazy stuff continues with this Double Pack 2 movie collection from the Carry On Gang. Lots of laughs good looking women,a little nudity...just a bawdy good english time. These movies are of course made the Benny Hill show so popular in the 1970's. It's English humor. In a world like we live in now where people are so touchy and serious it is nice to go back to a era where things were a little kinder.

If you like UK humor you will love all of these older comedies. I love them all. They do not make stuff like this anymore a bit of slapstick naughty humor with nothing really 'said' or shown. My kind of fun!
I always liked Wendy Richards in Are You Being Served, and I was curious to see what parts she had in these two Movies.  I truly enjoyed both movies even though she had very minor roles.
This double feature disc is a real hoot. In one, you will see a man in womens clothes, with all the mayhem that goes along with a group of girls. Very very funny, and really silly. It's great fun.
Forgotten how funny these movies were. Remember watching them as a kid back in England and they still make me laugh today. An absolute CLASSIC!!!
Thanks for your review of Carry On Double Feature Vol 4: Carry On Up the Jungle & Carry On Loving!
I've always loved the Carry On movies, and I was thrilled to find out they are being released in region 1 format! The quality of the picture is very good. I couldn't be happier!
